NAME: Curse of Monkey Island - Known issues
DESC: This is a list of current issues that need in SCUMM V8 support

center.b: Status: Part 1/2 fully playable, part 3 playable with graphical glitches if ship-to-ship combat is cheated past

ul.li:
Generic:
AKOS crash leaving the crash site on Blood Island (scummvm -d0 -b600)
Lack of actorHit opcode makes entering swordfighting during ship-to-ship oombat impossible without using shift-v cheat
Cannot fire cannons in ship-to-ship combat
Sound:
No SMUSH Audio: aquadran is working on this one
Voices 'pop'
Occasional crashes from 'sound que buffer overflow' (hard to reproduce)
Lack of imGetMusicPosition kernel function breaks song sync in Part 3 intro
Graphics:
Some text does not undraw correctly, again leaving behind artifacts
Masking artifacts. See many animations, eg during insult sword fighting
Conversation:
Verbs do not redraw correctly on scrolling, specifically during Insult Sword Fighting (Part 3). Makes it hard to complete without much squinting
Inventory:
Upon combining two items in such a way as to reduce a two-page inventory to a one-page, trying to select the last item will actually return the second-last item
Actor:
The CHORE opcode still seems to be returning dodgy results
setActorChoreLimbFrame isn't quite correct, eg Wallys animation after throwing the hook will show a few phantom frames of his 'throw hook' and 'standing at cannon' animation
Lack of MouthSync and MuaicMouthSync stuff causes odd actor speech animations
Actor 1 (Guybrush) occasionally gets stuck (e.g. after taking Wally's fake hook). Can work-around with console command "actor 1 ignoreboxes 1"
